features: RAIDERS OF THE LOST ARK: Indiana Jones travels the world, racing against the bad guys in search of the lost Ark of the Covenant
ENTERTAINMENT-INSPIRED DESIGN: Imagine exciting action with this premium Marion Ravenwood toy, inspired by Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
MOVIE-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES: This collectible Marion Ravenwood action figure includes detachable monkey and frying pan accessories
BUILD AN ARTIFACT: Collect all the figures in this Adventure Series assortment to acquire the pieces needed to build the Ark of the Covenant
PREMIUM ARTICULATION AND DETAILING: Fans can display this fully articulated figure featuring poseable head, arms, and legs, as well as premium deco, in their collection
ICONIC CHARACTERS: 6-inch Indiana Jones action figures feature iconic characters from the adventures of Indiana Jones, including Sallah, Belloq, Toht, and more
COLLECTIBLE TOYS: Discover other Indiana Jones Adventure Series 6-inch Indiana Jones toy figures to build a collection worthy of belonging in a museum (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: Marion Ravenwood is comfortable in any situation, including ballrooms and barroom brawls. Kids and collectors alike can imagine the adventures of Indiana Jones with figures from the Indiana Jones Adventure Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series unearths the quality and realism that Indiana Jones devotees love. The Adventure Series includes figures and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the adventures of Indiana Jones. (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) This collectible 6-inch-scale Adventure Series figure is detailed to look like the Marion Ravenwood character from Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Figures include Build An Artifact pieces so fans can build the lost Ark of the Covenant! Indiana Jones products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Indiana Jones Adventure Series | Marion Ravenwood Marion Ravenwood is comfortable in any situation, including ballrooms and barroom brawls. This collectible 6-inch-scale Adventure Series figure is detailed to look like the Marion Ravenwood character from Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Figures include Build An Artifact pieces so fans can build the lost Ark of the Covenant!

Indiana Jones Adventure Series The Indiana Jones Adventure Series is inspired by the 40-plus-year legacy of the adventures of Indiana Jones. Adventure Series 6-inch action figures and adult roleplay items feature premium design and detail. This Indiana Jones Adventure Series figure is detailed to look like the fierce Marion Ravenwood, as seen in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark The year is 1936 and intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones sets out in search of the fabled Lost Ark of the Covenant, racing a bitter rival and his evil cohorts to the prize. Over the course of a hair-raising adventure, Indy endures explosions, spiders, snakes, booby traps, and bad guys in his quest to save the holy relic. Premium Articulation and Design in 6-Inch Scale Featuring realistic detailing, Indiana Jones Adventure Series figures let fans re-create the exciting adventures of archaeologist Indiana Jones. Iconic characters are presented in 6-inch scale with premium design and deco, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Indiana Jones to the next level.

Movie-Inspired Accessories This collectible Marion Ravenwood action figure includes detachable monkey and frying pan accessories. Build an Artifiact Collect all the figures in this Adventure Series assortment to acquire the pieces needed to build the Ark of the Covenant. A Collection that Belongs in a Museum Featuring a cast of endearing companions and notorious villains, the Adventure Series lets fans bring home the action and excitement of the adventures of Indiana Jones, including highly articulated 6-inch figures and premium adult roleplay items. Hunt them down to build a collection worthy of a museum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I got it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great action figure heroine
reviews.reviewText: Marion Ravenwood was a key part of the Movies Raiders of the Lost Ark , Kingdom of the Crystal skull and Dial of Destiny. Its a great action figure heroine to add in any collectors world

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars And the monkey tooooo!!
reviews.reviewText: Marion is excellent, great likeness great detail on the shirt, the frying pan provides fun movie specific action , and then you get the monkey, tail moves to grab marions arm to keep it in place, its arms have ball joints at the shoulder so you get rotation and movement towards and away from the centerline of the body, the head is on on a tiny ball joint so you get full 360 and tilt in the head, plus the monkey has full paint apps, all on a 1in by1in monkey body that is sized correctly to the 6 in figures , if you cant get the monkey posed on the arm , look more closely at the promo images( monkeys hand is tucked under marions hair) or check out some review videos, learning to pose action figures is fun , just think it threw a bit, or get some museum putty and stick him were ever you want! Dont be fooled by some reviewers that arnt willing to put in minimal effort .This figure pack has nice value, and compliments the line well. also marions hair on mine is soft enough to get some head movement,It hinders a bit but not what I would call "Hard Plastic".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2023 (1st series) 6" Marion Ravenwood with monkey action figure
reviews.reviewText: Indiana Jones Raiders of the Lost Ark 6" Marion Ravenwood,in a 1 of 5 piece figures to complete the Artifact (the Ark of Convent piece). 4 stars for the very good likeness of the female star.All the 1st series Raiders figures will be sell out because there's a high demand/very popular,and the new Indiana Jones #5 movie will be out in the Summer of 2023.Don't wait to long to complete the 5 piece figures,to build the artifact (the Ark of Convent piece set) at the retail price!! Indiana Jones is already costing $40+ on the secondary market.The Indy is the first to sell/a high demand figure to collect, then the other figures.But you can still get the Indy so far at Hasbropulse online store at the retail price (the Spring of 2023). Act quickly before they are all gone.A Indiana Jones fan since 1981, Joe NY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product was great , the packages were superb the delivery was beyond fast deff buying from this place again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The wait for great Indiana Jones figures is over!!
reviews.reviewText: I am 49 years old with Daughters 24 and now 6...I have loved Indiana Jones since I was a kid, and collecting action figures along with my girls. FINALLY having a wonderful line of figures obviously crafted by fans of the series is something I have waited for since I was very young, and to share that with my kids, down to the little monkey Marion comes with is truly a joy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marion is here
reviews.reviewText: articulation is so soft and flexible! Nice figure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good figure, wish it had more…
reviews.reviewText: This is my only Karen Allen/Marion Ravenwood action figure I know of as I remember goes as a nerdy 21-year old. I do have a 3.75 inch Mutt Williams, her son by the way (spoilers!) but never had his mother as a kid when crystal skull came out in 2008.This action figure has a MONKEEEEY! THE MONKEEYYY! YAAAY! Sorry about that. It also includes her frying pan as her items that came in the box.I can barely move her head because of the hard, plastic black hair in the way, & I had problems trying to get the monkey on her arm like in the movie so I had to put the little boy next to her. I also had trouble trying to get her two hands holding the pan.I wish she had more than two hands and more accessories to her figure…Still a good figure, I highly recommend to fans.

reviews.reviewTitle: Preciosa un producto de alta calidad
reviews.reviewText: Muchísimas gracias está preciosa.Compraré más de esta marca.

Tanto para aquellos que colecciones figuras en general, como para fans de Indiana Jones, esta figura es muy recomendable por su acabado y por el gran parecido con la actriz que lo interpretó, además de tener un gran precio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very well done figure Hasbro done a good job. These seem to be selling fast
Ótimo acabamento, plástico fosco com toque macio, articulações boas e acessórios interessantes
